long_description: Lock your bags, lock your skis or lock your camera equipment-secure almost any type of gear while on the go with the compact PacSafe Retractasafe 250 cable lock. A convenient 35 in. of plastic-coated, retractable stainless-steel cable secures a variety of items together or to a secure fixture. 4-dial combination lock can be reset anytime, anywhere. Please note: Lock is not Travel Sentry(TM) approved-locks that are approved allow airport screeners access without damaging the lock.
short_description: Lock your bags, lock your skis or lock your camera equipment-secure almost any type of gear while on the go with the compact PacSafe Retractasafe 250 cable lock.
